StringProperty.Name: Command
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a command line for the custom build tool.

StringProperty.Name: Message
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a description for the custom build tool.

StringListProperty.Name: Outputs
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the output files the custom build tool generates.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalInputs
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies any additional input files to use for the custom build tool.

BoolProperty.Name: VerifyInputsAndOutputsExist
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether the build should verify that all given dependencies and outputs exist and warn if they don't.

BoolProperty.Name: LinkObjects
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether the Inputs and outputs files with specific extensions (.obj, .lib, .res, .rsc) are passed to the linker.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: OutputItemType
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies Item type to add output files to so they become sources for other build tools.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatOutputAsContent
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether the output file is a deployable content.

StringProperty.Name: RootFolder
StringProperty.Description: Content root folder to use for packaging.

BoolProperty.Name: BuildInParallel
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies that this item can be built in parallel with other custom build tool items.

IntProperty.Name: MaxProcesses
IntProperty.Description: Maximum number of CPU cores to use for parallel build. A value of 0 utilizes all available processors.

IntProperty.Name: MaxItemsInBatch
IntProperty.Description: Maximum number of items to execute together during parallel build. A value of 0 divides items evenly into parallel batches. A value of 1 disables batching. Larger batches will improve performance if the custom build tool processes items quickly.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: CustomBuildAfterTargets
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the targets for the custom build step and tool to run after.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: CustomBuildBeforeTargets
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the targets for the custom build step and tool to run before.
